Hey, Wait is over !!!
As demanded, we have change the gameplay completely for better user experience.
a. Third person shooting competition
b. New slow-mo effect added
c. pellets spawning & paint effects improved
d. One fire shoot &

Paintball Shooting has some new features added
1) Added third person camera angle and improved firing mechanism
2) UI/UX Improvements
3) You can unlock all heroes in a special offer now after playing 3 levels
4) Training mode improved
